work-item.field:
Let's suppose that the mobile version should have a more restrictive password configuration
  • Remove requirement Password must contain at least one number from our branched document  Portal Specification Android using work item menu.



  • Select requirement Password must contain at least 8 characters and add a more restrictive password configuration using Polarion's overwrite function


  • Add an additional requirement to your branched document.
Overwrite and Remove Requirements from branched documents
